Sports Towel (Yellow, M)
kDesc
A yellow sports towel worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
Une serviette de sport jaune, à porter autour du cou pendant une promenade sans t-shirt.[#Legal]
Ein gelben Sporthandtuch, das man sich um den Hals legen kann, wenn man kein Hemd trägt.[#Legal]
Un asciugamano sportivo giallo, da portare avvolto attorno al collo quando si cammina a torso nudo.[#Legal]
Una toalla de deporte amarilla que se coloca alrededor del cuello al pasear con el torso desnudo.[#Legal]
裸になった上半身の首にかけた、黄色のスポーツタオル。[#Legal]
벗은 상반신에 목에 거는, 옐로우 스포츠 타올.[#Legal]
A yellow sports towel worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
掛在赤裸上半身脖子上的黃色毛巾。[#Legal]
掛在赤裸上半身脖子上的黃色毛巾。[#Legal]
A yellow sports towel worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
